title: I absolutely did not deserve this ban and I would like this reviewed
body:
I was having a bad game and got kinda tilted and didn't play well. But the one of my teammates called me a n*gger, I responded by saying that he deserved to be reported and also messaged in all chat that he should be reported. I do not believe my behavior warranted a 14 day suspension.

CHAT LOG!

This ban is unfair and undeserved. Please review the ingame coms and you will see how unfair the situation is. Also I was being straight up bullied by a 4 man premade who probably all reported me when it wasn't deserved.

replies.body:
Report talking and circumventing filter. Just avoid the damn trigger words my dude. Though, a ticket can't hurt.

1 report = 9 reports. Stop being community brainwashed and saying "report X for Y". Let people make up their minds of who to report themselves. You know, like a grownup who doesn't get themselves banned. I know it feels good to call "report" in all chat, but don't.

Also, even if manually reviewed, what others said to you does not factor into your punishment. I would just stop reflecting people if I were you.

You're right, it was dumb of me to ask for reports I should have just muted everyone and shut my damn mouth. But it starts to get to me when a 4 man premade starts laying into me, calling me racial slurs, and treating me like trash. It ruins the entire experience. But again you're right I shouldn't have even said anything. I really hope a ticket helps my situations :< I'm so worried. I don't want my honor level to be messed up or to be banned for 14 days.

Just out of curiosity for the sake of the situation, is asking for reports against terms and conditions?

https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/PzY1ArN3-we-dont-ban-people-for-asking-for-reports
According to the riot posts here, just saying "report x" isn't enough to warrant a restriction. It seems like it is only a problem if there is a pattern of negative behavior in that match and other recent matches.

I think the ban you received was because of instant feedback on slurs and phrases since even though you didn't call anyone bad things people can still see the slurs. I think you should send a ticket to riot and explain the situation with your chat logs. They might not take it back or maybe reduce it because the goal as a player is to NOT say any slurs or offensive phrases in any context.
I don't think so, but it's an easy way to start a flame war in-game, so I'd only do it if it's a straight-up troll.
